story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does Rust Buster Gravel Fondo land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Rust Buster Gravel Fondo? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Rust Buster Gravel Fondo scored 37 out of 100. Grassroots tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race Rust Buster Gravel Fondo?

broll_sources.query: Rust Buster Gravel Fondo gravel race

beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Rust Buster Gravel Fondo. Memphis, TN. 50 mi. Tennessee delta gravel.
beats.text_on_screen: Rust Buster Gravel Fondo | Memphis, TN | 50 mi

broll_sources.query: Rust Buster Gravel Fondo route map
Rust Buster Gravel Fondo course walkthrough

beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Let's go through the scores. Value. 3 out of 5. The math works out. Barely. Elevated post-race food including lamb tacos and key lime pie beats standard "fig newton and warm Gatorade. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Mid-range expenses. Budget a proper race weekend. Logistics. 2 out of 5. Basic setup. Don't expect hand-holding. Clark Butcher at Victory Bicycle Studio handles organization from midtown Memphis, with Padraig noting the shop's community-building focus. Length. 2 out of 5. Short but honest about it. The advertised 45-mile route actually measured closer to 52 miles according to riders. Technicality. 2 out of 5. Your road bike might survive. Might. Padraig describes encountering "100-meter-long hills that tilt at 13 percent" in the Meeman-Shelby Forest State Park bluff land. Climate. 2 out of 5. Mostly pleasant. Check the forecast anyway. Historical weather data shows average highs of 71°F and lows of 52°F, with a 49% chance of rain on any given day. Adventure. 2 out of 5. Light adventure. Nothing wild. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Nothing special about the race execution. Clark's tire recommendation to Padraig shows attention to course conditions.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The rest. Quick-fire. Experience. 2 out of 5. A nice day on the bike. Nothing more. Community. 2 out of 5. Riders acknowledge each other. Barely. Elevation. 1 out of 5. Elevation gain measured in speed bumps. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Sea level. Your lungs get a day off. Prestige. 1 out of 5. Under the radar. Completely unknown. Field Depth. 1 out of 5. Not exactly stacked.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.narration: What they don't put on the website.
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: The logistics. What you actually need to know.

broll_sources.query: Rust Buster Gravel Fondo race day

beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Lodging: Memphis has lodging. Book ahead.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Tennessee Delta Gravel. If you're local to TN/Southeast. yes, it's solid. If you're traveling. skip it.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Rust Buster Gravel Fondo isn't quite right for you. For better TN races: Reliance Tennessee Gravel, Gravel Revival.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Rust Buster Gravel Fondo? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

meme_inserts.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic reveal pose, tier badge prominent, 'Rust Buster Gravel Fondo' bold text, tier badge 'GRASSROOTS', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. SEO-optimize title for '[Race Name] review'.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Shorts: hook, biggest surprise score, verdict.
cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.
